metaTags.metaTitle: Website under attack? | Get 24/7 Emergency support
metaTags.metaDescription: Protect against ongoing cyber attacks within minutes with Cloudflare. Call our cyber emergency hotline for support and mitigation of cyber attacks.

marketoEmbeddedForm.bladeName: Under Attack Hotline Marketo Form (1639) Variation

relatedBlades.title: Comprehensive protection against cyber attacks
iconTitleList: Get low latency cyber protection in minutes.
Protection against DDoS, website, application, workforce, and infrastructure attacks.
Largest global network of DDoS mitigation data centers.
iconCopyList: Cloudflare can protect you against DDoS, ransomware, identity or access, network, web and application attacks.
DDoS + WAF + CDN and other security and performance functions are all built on the same global network. Measure deployment of these services in minutes and hours, not weeks or months.

Keep known and unknown threats away from your apps, user devices, network, and email accounts. Threat intelligence for ransomware, phishing and more is derived from 1+ trillion daily DNS requests and preemptively crawling the Internet for emerging attacks.
Cloudflare's network has %{DataCenterCount}+ data centers across the globe. That's five times more than key competitors. Block DDoS attacks of any size and kind.

featureList.title: Get low latency cyber protection in minutes
featureList.description: Cloudflare can protect you against DDoS, ransomware, identity or access, network, web and application attacks.

featureList.title: Protection against DDoS, website, application, workforce, and infrastructure attacks
featureList.description: DDoS + WAF + CDN and other security and performance functions are all built on the same global network. Measure deployment of these services in minutes and hours, not weeks or months.

featureList.title: Zero Trust security
featureList.description: Keep known and unknown threats away from your apps, user devices, network, and email accounts. Threat intelligence for ransomware, phishing and more is derived from 1+ trillion daily DNS requests and preemptively crawling the Internet for emerging attacks.

featureList.title: Largest global network of DDoS mitigation data centers
featureList.description: Cloudflare's network has %{DataCenterCount}+ data centers across the globe. That's five times more than key competitors. Block DDoS attacks of any size and kind.

relatedBlades.copy1: A Cloudflare security specialist will reach out, gather the necessary information to get started, and diagnose the type of attack that is occurring.
relatedBlades.copy2: Our Cloudflare attack mitigation team will work with you to scope, mitigate, and match you with the appropriate solutions to stop the attack.
relatedBlades.copy3: Once onboarded, users will be able to monitor the impact of the attack and affected properties, and begin remediation planning with a Cloudflare specialist.

relatedBlades.title: Protect your people, apps, and networks
relatedBlades.description: Cloudflare offers comprehensive security via scalable, programmable, cloud-native services.

relatedBlades.quote: "Within 48 hours of enabling Cloudflare Bot Management, attacks against a particular API endpoint dropped by 70%"

features.title: Massive network scale
features.description: Our global network spans over %{DataCenterCount} cities & %{CountryCount} countries. Operating within %{OperationMilliseconds} milliseconds of about %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the Internet-connected population globally.

features.title: Ease of use & guided setup
features.description: No code changes; the Cloudflare dashboard enables quick configuration. Enterprise guided onboarding, training & continued 24/7/365 support.

icon.description: icon easy on and off blue

features.title: Integrated security & performance
features.description: Deeply integrated products that form a unified control plane. Unified layered security across all endpoints & users.

features.title: 24/7 email & phone support
features.description: Award winning, global, 24/7/365 email & emergency phone support (Enterprise plans). Plus on-demand resources, guides & best practice implementation.

features.title: 100% uptime reliability
features.description: Network prioritization exclusive to Cloudflare Enterprise plans. Dependable service level agreements (SLA) with 100% uptime & reliable service you can trust.

features.title: Developer friendly
features.description: Reduce the cost & complexity of legacy network hardware. Augment existing applications or create  new ones without configuring or maintaining infrastructure.
